mapper.insert: INSERT INTO liferegister ( common_code, common_id, common_pw, common_name, common_birth, common_gender, common_phone, common_addr ) values ( (select count(common_code)+1 from liferegister lr), #{common_id}, #{common_pw}, #{common_name}, #{common_birth}, #{common_gender}, #{common_phone}, #{common_addr} )

INSERT INTO law_info
values( (SELECT CONCAT('L', '-', (SELECT LPAD(common_code ,4,'0') FROM liferegister lr where common_id = common_id ))), (select common_code from liferegister r where common_id = '#{common_id}'), #{license}, 1);

INSERT INTO saver_info ( saver_code, common_code, saver_license, saver_grade, saver_job, saver_job_addr ) values( (select concat('S', '-', (select lpad(lr.common_code ,4,'0') from liferegister lr where common_id = '${lr.common_id}' ))), (select lr.common_code from liferegister lr where common_id = '${lr.common_id}'), ${saver_license}, ${saver_grade}, ${saver_job}, ${saver_job_addr});
